Derangement: Self-Defeating Personality Disorder (SDPD): Also known as Masochism, characters that suffer from SDPD tend to associate feeling of pain and/or other feelings of discomfort. Many fear to assert themselves against the sources of their pain, others do not know anything different, and others rationalize it as punishment for their "sins".[21]
Basic_Information.Name: Doug, Etna

Skills.Discern the Aura: Scan a group of people with one particular trait in their aura
Skills.Eagle's Sight: Gain a bird's eye view of your area
Skills.Heightened Senses: The vampire can add their Auspex rating to their perception checks.
Skills.Horoscopic Forecast: Gain a glimpse of the target's future
Skills.Melange: See the truths behind reality in metaphor
Skills.Obeah: Soothes the psychological turmoil of the vampire's subject. Amalgam: Fortitude 1.
Skills.Personality Metamorph: Take on fictitious personalities as your own
Skills.Pluck the Secret: Learn what a target knows about a specific subject
Skills.Premonition: The vampire can receive visions and hints about what is about to happen.
Skills.Psychic Assault: Make a powerful mental attack against a target's psyche
Skills.Sense the Unseen: The vampire can detect things that are supernaturally invisible
Skills.Share the Senses: The vampire can sense through the senses of another kindred or mortal.
Skills.Spirit's Touch: The vampire can touch an inanimate object to sense the emotional residue from when the object was last used
Skills.Telepathy: The vampire can project their thoughts into the mind of another kindred or mortal or read surface level thoughts and emotions.
Skills.The Call (also known as Malkavian Madnes: a Malkavian-exclusive ability that enables the vampire to summon a clan gathering.
Skills.The Mind Revealed: Continuously read someone's thoughts to know what they are thinking and about to do
Skills.The Oracle's Sight: Hear and see the thoughts of everyone around you

Skills.Ancestral Dominion: The vampire can make their Kindred descendants to take actions on their behalf, without the need for eye contact and verbal communication. Amalgam: Blood Sorcery 3.
Skills.Chain the Psyche: Attempting to circumvent your Dominate commands fills the target with incapacitating pain
Skills.Cloud Memory: The vampire can make the target forget the past few minutes.
Skills.Compel: The vampire can issue a short sentence command to the target.
Skills.Dementation: Amalgam Obfuscate 2. The vampire can trigger psychotic breaks or nervous breakdowns.
Skills.Domitor's Favor: Makes it more difficult for a vampire's Blood Bonded thrall to act against them.
Skills.Dynastic Power: Control mortal descendants and implant suggestions using just a name or picture of the target
Skills.Fealty: Enforce oaths a target makes to you so they cannot be broken
Skills.Mass Manipulation: You can use Dominate on small groups at once
Skills.Mesmerize: The vampire can issue a longer, more complicated command to the target.
Skills.Obedience: The vampire may use any Dominate power without eye contact. Touching their skin, or even clothing, is sufficient.
Skills.Oberon's Grail: Erase entire nights of a target's memory
Skills.Rationalize: The vampire can make victims of their Dominate powers internalize the commands and not realize they were compelled.
Skills.Repression of the Obvious: Learn a thought the target is repressing and make them blurt it out
Skills.Slavish Devotion: The vampire can strengthen the mind of their dominated victims, against interference from other Kindred. Amalgam: Presence 1.
Skills.Still the Mortal Flesh: Shut down the body functions of a target
Skills.Submerged Directive: The vampire can use Mesmerize to embed delayed or triggered commands.
Skills.Terminal Decree: The vampire can now issue commands that are deadly or harmful to their targets.
Skills.Tranquility: Ease a vampire out of Frenzy
Skills.Tyrant's Gaze: Reduce the Attributes of a target with a look

Skills.Busy Doing Nothing: Makes you appear to be doing nothing
Skills.Cache: Extend an Obfuscate power so that it continues after you have left the area
Skills.Chimerstry: The vampire can create brief, but vivid single-sensory hallucinations. Amalgam: Presence 1.
Skills.Cloak: Hide yourself from Auspex powers searching for you
Skills.Cloak of Shadows: The vampire can become invisible while standing motionless.
Skills.Cloak the Gathering: The vampire can Obfuscate their companions.
Skills.Conceal: Amalgam of Auspex 3. The vampire can cloak an inaminate object up to a small building from sight.
Skills.Diastatsis: Lets the user fade away and replace themselves with an illusionary self they can control
Skills.Fortress of Silence: Cut any noises off, allowing clarity of thought and heightened awareness of self, or use on a target to drive it mad with the sound of its own heartbeat
Skills.Ghost in the Machine: Other Obfuscate powers work on electronic recording devices.
Skills.Manifold Guise: Make everyone in an area look like someone else as with Mask of a Thousand Faces, whether they want to or not
Skills.Mask of a Thousand Faces: The vampire can assume the voice and appearance of a generic person who blends in the current setting, i.e. a worker in a factory or a nightwatchman in an office.
Skills.Mental Maze[4]: The Vampire can make the victim unable to escape the building, leaving him feeling that the building folds back on itself. Amalgam: Dominate (VTM) 1.
Skills.Silence of Death: The vampire can nullify all sound that they make.
Skills.Vanish: Requires Cloak of Shadows. The vampire can activate Cloak of Shadows or Unseen Passage even under direct observation.

Skills.Bound Famulus: The vampire can form a bond with an animal facilitating the use of other Animalism powers.
Skills.Feral Whispers: The vampire can summon and communicate with an animal.
Skills.Sense the Beast: The vampire can sense the beast within other vampires, mortals and supernatural creatures.â€‹â€‹

Skills.A Taste for Blood: By tasting a drop of blood, the user can discern certain basic traits of the one to whom it belongs
Skills.Blood of Potency: The vampire can concentrate their Blood, increasing its potency temporarily
Skills.Extinguish Vitae: The user can intentionally remove the unlife-giving properties of some of the Blood in another vampire, stoking their Hunger as the victimâ€™s inner reserves curdle into impotence
Skills.Scorpion\u00e2\u20ac\u2122s Touch: The vampire can transmute some of their Blood into a paralyzing poison, capable of affecting mortals and vampires alike
Skills.Shape of the Sanguine Sacrament: Allows the vampire manipulate their (or someone else's) blood, to form intricated images, such as a simple message or a geometrical shape.
Skills.Theft of Vitae: Through mystical means, the vampire opens a wound in a major artery of a mortal victim, blood shooting out through the air in a stream toward the open mouth of the user.

Skills.Blink: The vampire can cross large distances and still take additional actions such as make an attack.
Skills.Fleetness: The vampire can add their Celerity to non-combat Dexterity checks.
Skills.Rapid Reflexes: The vampire suffers no penalty to dodging gunfire without cover.
Skills.Unerring Aim: Amalgam Auspex 2. The vampire can prevent their target from dodging or defending against the vampire's ranged attacks.

Skills.Defy Bane: The vampire can downgrade Aggravated damage into Superficial damage.
Skills.Toughness: The vampire can subtract Fortitude rating from all Superficial damage sustained.
Skills.Unswayable Mind: The vampire can add their Fortitude rating to dice rolls to resist manipulation and coercion.
Skills.Valeren: Projects Fortitude outwardly, willing the vampire's Blood to mend another vampire's injuries. Amalgam: Auspex 1.

Skills.Ashes to Ashes: The vampire may disintegrate non-Kindred corpses with their vitae, including animated cadavers like those brought to false life with Oblivion.
Skills.Fatal Precognition: The vampire's eyes become black and they remain still while they scry a vision which shows the death of a non-Kindred they can percieve. Attempts to subvert the fate seen in the vision become more difficult. Amalgam with Auspex 2.
Skills.Shadow Cast: The vampire summons a supernatural shadow from Oblivion, one which they control and can only be destroyed by sunlight. It allows them to use other Oblivion powers through it despite the presence of light, and casting it on somebody during social conflict intensifies the Willpower damage that victim suffers.

Skills.Lethal Body: The Kindred can cause serious physical damage to a mortal, capable of tearing skin and breaking bone.
Skills.Prowess: The Kindred gains an overall increase in strength.
Skills.Soaring Leap: The Kindred can leap higher and further.

Skills.Awe: The vampire can add their Presence rating to their Persuasion and Performance checks
Skills.Lingering Kiss: The vampire can gain bonuses to their Social pools against targets that they have Kissed.
Skills.Love: Make someone enamored with you as if in a blood bond
Skills.Magnum Opus: Amalgam Auspex 3. When the vampire creates a work of art (ex: painting, sculpture), they can impart on to their work a portion of their Presence, making the audience succumb to it's hypnotic allure or fear it's dreadful visage.
Skills.Star Magnetism: Awe, Daunt, and Entrancement can be used through live feeds and electronic streams.
Skills.True Love's Face: Combining Presence with Obfuscate, the vampire can take the appearance of someone their victim loves.

Skills.Eyes of the Beast: The vampire can will a supernatural red gleam into their eyes, giving them sight even in the total absence of light.
Skills.Feral Weapons: The vampire can extend their natural weapons to monstrous proportions. This usually takes the form of fingernails extending into wicked talons but can also come in other forms such as fangs elongating into veritable daggers, as from a gigantic serpent.
Skills.Horrid Form: The vampires takes on a truly monstrous form. Amalgam: Dominate 2. Requires  Vicissitude.
Skills.Mist Form: The vampire gains the legendary power to turn into a cloud of mist, perceivable to the eye but untouchable by anything save fire, sunlight, and supernatural aggression. They can fit through pipes, crevices, and cracks. While strong winds might buffet them, no natural force can disperse the cloud.
Skills.Shapechange: The vampire can assume the shape of an animal roughly the same size as their original mass. The vampire can only change into one type of animal (usually a wolf, sometimes a large feline or a giant snake), usually one associated with their clan or the type of prey they most commonly feed on. The animal, while usually a spectacular example of their species, shows no signs to a mundane observer of being supernatural.
Skills.Vicissitude: The vampire reshapes one's own skin, muscles, and bone at will. Amalgam: Dominate 2.
Skills.Weight of the Feather: The vampire can reduce their effective mass and density, making themselves almost weightless. This allows them to avoid triggering pressure sensors as well as avoiding major damage from falls, collisions, or being thrown. The power cannot be used for longer leaps, as the vampireâ€™s strength is proportionally reduced.

Skills.Chemically Induced Flashback: By melting down a deceased vampire's possessions, the alchemist can gain access to the vampire's memories through Ashe Prerequisite: Concoct Ashe[1]
